info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 5 at 9:17PM EDT until April 8 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Northern Indiana
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...
Salamonie River below Warren affecting Wabash, Huntington, Wells, Jay and Blackford Counties.
...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in Indiana...Ohio...
Saint Joseph River Ohio near Newville affecting De Kalb, Defiance and Allen IN Counties.
For the Salamonie River...including Warren, Portland...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Saint Joseph River Ohio...including Montpelier, Newville, St. Joe River Ft. Wayne...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Salamonie River below Warren.
* WHEN...From this evening to Tuesday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The river reaches flood stage with minor flooding of low agricultural land and roads nearest the river. Belleville Road and East Flowing Well Road northwest of Warren become impassable and isolated nearby residences.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 PM EDT Saturday was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.4 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.
The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon at 330 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TUESDAY AFTERNOON

area.areaDesc: Blackford, IN; Huntington, IN; Jay, IN; Wabash, IN; Wells, IN
